title: Food Categories Configuration Schema
description: Schema for food categories configuration file that defines available food categories

id.description: Unique identifier for the food category

name.description: Internal name for the food category

displayName.description: User-facing display name for the food category

icon.description: Emoji or icon representation for the category

color.description: Hex color code for the category

subcategories.description: List of subcategories within this food category
